message: I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price! It's a one-time offer, so don't miss out.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $60. Can you meet me at that price?
I can do better than that, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $85.
I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway from your last offer. How about $75?
I'm not quite ready to meet you at $75, but I'm willing to compromise. How about we meet at $82.50?
I'm not sure I can go as high as $82.50, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. How about $80?
